data.prayer: the state of Upper Nile has (about) 19,833 people who know Jesus, 83,963 people who know about him culturally, and 78,804 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Upper Nile, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Upper Nile, South Sudan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Upper Nile that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Upper Nile with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Ingessana, Gaam people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Upper Nile, South Sudan.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Upper Nile, South Sudan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Upper Nile, South Sudan has a population of 182,600.

We estimate Upper Nile has 19,833 people who might know Jesus, 83,963 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 78,804 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 19,833 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
